Code.description: The code of the quantity e.g QtySold, QtyReturned

Amount.description: The (required) actual quantity amount measure as a numerical e.g 1

UnitMeasure.description: The quantity unit measure e.g Each, Package, Bundle, Parcel

UnitType.description: The quantity unit type. e.g Metric, Imperial

UnitScheme.description: The quantity unit scheme e.g ISO xx

Lineage.description: The event lineage (e.g eventId, asOf) that lead to the observed/derived state of this object/data part
